Echae Kang

Korean: 강이채

Group (2015-present):
Echae en Route

Introduction

Echae Kang is a South Korean singer and violinist. She debuted on April 1, 2015 with the EP Madeline. She is a member of the the duo Echae en Route. She’s the director of the Dear Jazz Orchestra .
